p: For centuries, plant EOs have been used for curing many diseases such as melaleuca EO which is considered an effective factor for speeding up the healing process of wounds. Lavender EO was commonly used to heal wounds, cuts, burns, and sunburns by improving the formation of scar tissues [ 8]. Tea tree oil has been shown to be effective in vitro on several strains of methicillin-resistant S. aureus (MRSA) isolated from wounds [ 50]. The EOs extracted from frankincense and geranium can be used as antiseptic agents by burning them. They can also be applied internally to protect the wounds from developing infections [ 51].
